title: MADE Show 2024 Video – Killer Custom Mountain Bikes
content:
It’s a wrap on MADE 2024. Once again, Zidell Yards in Portland, Oregon was host to an incredible show packed with drool-worthy bikes. There’s a ton to dig into, including this video of all the incredible mountain bike builds from the show from BTCHN, Apogee, Flatiron, Prova, Slow Southern Steel, Rare Earth, Significant Other, Sanitas Cycles, and Sycip. Enjoy!

The post MADE Show 2024 Video – Killer Custom Mountain Bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
